desc: A Revolutionary Scar Healing System. Designed by Doctors. Clinically proven. Scarology® scar healing works on old and new scars, c-section and acne scars.

layout.text: products can be used on any skin type and are suitable for both adults and children.

Born out of both innovation and necessity, Scarology® was developed by husband and wife physician team, Dr. Michael A. Connor and Dr. Jeanmarie Connor. Dr. Michael Connor specializes in oculoplastic surgery and Dr. Jeanmarie Connor is a pediatrician.
